snippet: A group of young conservatives is buying former President Ronald Reagan's California ranch to use as a training center for future political leaders.    The Young America's Foundation, a group that promotes conservative values among high school and...
lead_paragraph: A group of young conservatives is buying former President Ronald Reagan's California ranch to use as a training center for future political leaders. The Young America's Foundation, a group that promotes conservative values among high school and college students, plans to run its Ronald Reagan Leadership Development Program on the 688-acre ranch, said Marc Short, the group's executive director.
abstract: Young America's Foundation, group of young conservatives, is buying former President Ronald Reagan's California ranch to use as training center for future political leaders (S)

headline.main: National News Briefs; Reagans Selling Ranch To Conservative Group
